name: Pester
friendlyName: Pester Test Runner from Black Marble
description: Run Pester tests without the need to install Pester in with the PMModule folder or in the source repo (Using Pester 3.4.3 or 4.0.8)
author: Richard Fennell

inputs.name: CodeCoverageOutputFile
inputs.label: Code Coverage Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Code coverage output file (JaCoCo format) - Requires Pester version 4.0.4+

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags used to filter which tests to run.

inputs.name: excludeTag
inputs.label: Exclude Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags to exclude when running tests.

inputs.name: pesterVersion
inputs.label: Pester version (stored in task)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Verson of Pester to use from a choice of versions shipped in task. Will be used if Pester not installed in agent, or ForceUsage parameter set

inputs.name: moduleFolder
inputs.label: Module Folder override
inputs.helpMarkDown: If left blank the Pester module stored in this task will be used, to load the Pester module from elsewhere set the path

inputs.name: ForceUseOfPesterInTasks
inputs.label: Force the use of a Pester Module shipped within this task
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force the use of the Pester version shipped in this task, even if Pester installed on agent.
